title: Boose & Gar
description: Many years ago a powerful race of insect-like aliens known as the Reneguell began a destructive religious Jihad that cut a path through the very heart of the traversable universe.For many centuries this technically advanced and highly mobile race had been attacking billions of inhabited planets, constructing immense machines called Dyna-Thermal Combustules on each one of these conquered worlds. Their The Day of Joining.
author: James Groman
